description: Rito`s female alter-ego, she is a beautiful girl (with a physical appearance resembling a tomboy) who gets much attention from men, such as Motemitsu, the perverted principal and even Saruyama, Rito`s best friend. Later, Saruyama falls in love with "Riko-chan" and asks Lala to invite her for a date, which out of pity she will forcefully change Rito so he can go on a date with him.
name: Yuusaki Riko
